oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Capitol Hill Redevelopment - Demolition Dedication Ceremonies, 1953
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the demolition dedication ceremonies for the Capitol Hill Redevelopment Project, 6 November 1953. Launched in 1949, the project was to become the nation's first urban renewal plan funded by Congress. Photographed by J.W. Smith. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
